item.title: Tong Yang
item.description: Tong Yang (杨仝) (Google Scholar) received his PHD degree in Computer Science from Tsinghua University in 2013. He visited Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) China from 2013.7 to 2014.7. Now he is an associate professor in School of Computer Science, Peking University. Research Area: Network Big Data, Sketches, Network measurement, Bloom filters, IP lookups, KV stores, Hash tables, and etc. 常年招收本校或外校本科实习生, 欢迎优秀同学洽谈攻读博士学位. Email: yangtongemail@gmail.com Research: Papers in 2023 Yuhan Wu, Siyuan Dong, Yi Zhou, Yikai Zhao, Fangcheng Fu,  Tong Yang, Chaoyue Niu, Fan Wu, Bin Cui.
